CustomField.description: Ensure completion of peer review comments on lifelines
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Review plans on Voyant and comment here on the changes/amendments needed. This should reflect the Voyant assumptions document/key assumptions within the deck and the assumptions section within the narrative. Any best practices should also be noted, e.g. event names that don't need to appear on the Lifeline.
CustomField.label: 4 eye lifeline comments
